reference.shortdesc: The glossSymbol element identifies a standard image that is associated with the subject of the term.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The glossSymbol element is specialized from image. It is defined in the glossary entry module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the glossSymbol can be used to associate an image with glossary entry topic for Atlantic penguins:
example.codeblock: <glossentry id="atlanticpuffin"> <glossterm>Atlantic Puffin</glossterm> <glossdef>A sea bird that lives in the Atlantic</glossdef> <glossBody> <glossSymbol href="puffinicon.jpg" scope="local"> <alt>Atlantic puffin icon</alt> </glossSymbol> </glossBody> </glossentry>
